attributes.action: fine or sack MP's for irregular expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As with most business if someone is caught embezzling funds they would normally be fined, sacked and/or imprisoned. Why should those in Parliament who are employed by the people of UK be treated any differently?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
